title: Initial P: Saint Paul Giving a Book to a Messenger
description: Initial P: Saint Paul Giving a Book to a Messenger; Unknown; Lille, France; about 1260 - 1270; Tempera, gold leaf, and pen and black ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with reddish-brown pigskin; Leaf: 46.7 x 34.9 cm (18 3/8 x 13 3/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig I 9, fol. 15v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
